title: Campo di Cielo Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Organic, Western
description: A bio vegetarian/vegan restaurant located in a B&B open for non-guests on Friday for dinner and Saturday and Sunday for lunch and dinner. The Green building is made completely of wood with high energy savings and is also a bio vegetarian farm house. B&B consists of 4 rooms, a sauna, a relaxation room and a library. Restaurant is always open for groups with at least 5 persons. Rooms are available all days, and for guests, restaurant is always open.
